info.name: Steam - Better Avatar Borders
info.description: Important: Click the "Show CSS Code" button first. The install button will work after that. I highly recommend this style that makes the "Show CSS Code" button much easier to find. â€• This is a simple style that changes the appearance of the borders around users avatars to make them look more appealing. Version: 1.0.0 | View change logs (None available)
info.additionalInfo: This style was created for my personal preferences to change the weird-looking borders around the users' avatars into something more thick and vibrant in colors. I don't know if that's just me but the original borders are looking kinda thin on a side and thicker on the other side along with a weird color tone to them. So I decided to change that and make them look appealing.
